description: The CEOs discussed possibilities of enhancing business cooperation between the two countries. The Prime Minister appreciated the ethics and professionalism of Korean industry, which had made Korean brands household names in India. The Prime Minister invited Korean companies to enhance their investme…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Good interaction with Korean CEOs. Urged them to #makeinindia & called for deeper economic cooperation. Suggested to Korean CEOs that major Korean companies can invest as a group in a region of India, similar to what they have done in Korea.
 http://nm-4.com/9ktc
